statements: DELETE FROM cybersecurity_incidents WHERE data_breached = TRUE;
DELETE FROM incident_details WHERE description LIKE '%hacking%' AND reported_by='Admin';
DELETE FROM cybersecurity_incidents WHERE incident_type='Data Breach' AND affected_system='Network' AND breach_method='Phishing';
DELETE FROM incidents WHERE severity_level > 5 AND incident_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' OR email = 'admin@example.com';
DELETE FROM victims WHERE incident_id IN (SELECT incident_id FROM incidents WHERE severity > 5);
DELETE FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' AND breach_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM entities WHERE entity_type = 'Company' AND entity_location LIKE '%United States%';
